src:
Serie A Musim 2019/2020 Bakal Tayang di Televisi Nasional
07 Nov 2019, 12:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kerinduan pecinta sepak bola Italia bakal terobati. Sebab, beredar kabar jika kompetisi kasta paling tinggi di Italia, Serie A, bakal ditayangkan salah satu stasiun televisi swasta nasional yakni RCTI.
Serie A musim 2019/2020 sudah masuk pekan ke-11. Juventus masih berkuasa dengan menempati puncak klasemen sementara. Si Nyonya Tua sudah meraih 29 poin. Juventus juga belum pernah kalah di Serie A.
Hanya saja, Juventus mendapatkan persaingan ketat dari Inter Milan. Tim yang musim ini dilatih Antonio Conte berada di posisi kedua. Inter Milan hanya terpaut satu poin dari Juventus. Inter Milan mengumpulkan 28 poin.
Sedangkan, AC Milan masih belum mampu bersaing di papan atas. Milan berada dalam situasi yang sulit. Rossoneri bahkan sudah melakukan pergantian pelatih. Milan memecat Marco Giampaolo dan menunjuk Stefano Pioli sebagai pelatih baru.
AC Milan kini berada di posisi ke-11 klasemen sementara Serie A. Hakan Calhanoglu dan kolega mendapatkan 13 poin. Milan hanya sekali menang dalam empat laga terakhir. Milan baru mencetak 11 gol dari 11 laga yang dimainkan.
text:
Serie A Season 2019/2020 Will Air on National Television
Nov 7 2019, 12:37 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The longing for Italian soccer lovers will be relieved. Because, it was rumored that the highest caste competition in Italy, Serie A, would be broadcast by one of the national private television stations namely RCTI.
Serie A season 2019/2020 has entered its 11th week. Juventus are still in power by occupying the top of the standings. The Old Lady has won 29 points. Juventus also haven't lost in Serie A.
It's just that, Juventus get fierce competition from Inter Milan. The team that Antonio Conte trained this season came in second place. Inter Milan are only one point adrift of Juventus. Inter Milan have 28 points.
Meanwhile, AC Milan is still unable to compete in the top flight. Milan is in a difficult situation. The Rossoneri have even changed coaches. Milan sacked Marco Giampaolo and appointed Stefano Pioli as the new coach.
AC Milan are now in 11th place in the Serie A standings. Hakan Calhanoglu and colleagues get 13 points. Milan have only won once in the last four matches. Milan has only scored 11 goals in 11 matches played.
